titles.title: Emergency Biodiesel Tax Incentive Extension Act of 2010
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the incentives for biodiesel and renewable diesel.
Emergency Biodiesel Tax Incentive Extension Act of 2010

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Emergency Biodiesel Tax Incentive Extension Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the income tax credit for biodiesel and renewable diesel used as fuel and the excise tax credit for biodiesel fuel mixtures.
